mlogic.algos.graph

Class PrimsMinimumSpanningTree

  • java.lang.Object
    • mlogic.algos.graph.PrimsMinimumSpanningTree

  • public class PrimsMinimumSpanningTree
extends java.lang.Object
    Identifies a Minimum Spanning Tree (MST) in an edge-weighted graph using Prim's algorithm. Minimum Spanning tree is minimal-weight collection of edges that connects all the nodes in a connected graph. Minimum spanning forest is a collection of minimum spanning trees of a disconnected graph.
    Author:
    Rajaram G
